page.title: 02HAMPSTEAD GARDEN SUBURB
page.content: The{Garden Suburb}was devised by{Dame {Henrietta Barnett}in 1907, two of the architects were{Lutyens}and{Unwin. } The idea of it was to have people rich and poor, all living together in one place.That's why the houses are of different sizes. Dame Henrietta wanted the Suburb to have a{countryside {atmosphere,}so the houses are like cottages and there are many different designs. When it was built each house had two fruit trees in the garden. The{Suburb}has changed since 1907.The place became so popular that lots of people wanted to move in and prices went up.Now most people who live in the Garden Suburb are quite{wealthy.} If you want to build an extension or something that changes the look of your house you have to ask permission from the {Garden Suburb Trust,}so that it will still look basically the same.
